name: Dr. Nadia Benkirane
description: Dr. Nadia Benkirane is a prominent marine biologist who specializes in marine ecosystems and the conservation of marine biodiversity. She has conducted extensive research on the impacts of pollution on marine life in Moroccan waters, with a particular focus on coral reefs and marine plants. Her work has contributed significantly to marine conservation efforts in Morocco, advocating for sustainable policies to protect the countryâ€™s marine resources.
